mapper.select: SELECT s.subject_name as subject, sq.exam_date as examDate, dl.detail_license_name as qualification, q.question as question, q.option1 as option1, q.option2 as option2, q.option3 as option3, q.option4 as option4, q.answer as answer, q.image as imagePath, usa.select_answer as select_answer, usa.is_correct as is_correct FROM license l JOIN detail_license dl ON l.license_idx = dl.license_idx JOIN subject s ON dl.detail_license_idx = s.detail_license_idx JOIN question q ON s.subject_idx = q.subject_idx JOIN user_select_answer usa ON q.question_idx = usa.question_idx JOIN session_question sq ON q.question_idx = sq.question_idx WHERE dl.detail_license_name = #{detail_license} AND usa.start_test_date = #{start_test_date} AND usa.member_id = #{member_id} AND sq.exam_date = #{exam_date}
